item.title: Report E-2024060121
item.description:
Report E-2024060121

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-18T15:12:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-31
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Approximately 1 gallon of UN1993 Waste Flammable Liquids, n.o.s. (Cyclohexanone, Ethyl Lactate), 3, II released from a tanker truck dome lid, migrated through the drain line and impacted asphalt beneath the trailer when the vehicle parked, pending receipt by the Veolia TSDF in Henderson, CO. The cleanup was conducted in-house. There were no employee exposures or injuries.
